data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=CCACBoI5f1YQ7kNvgEr4G7a&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AgGzeJkxdMpTFnHEoDQnB86&oh=00_AYDCi4YnnS_farO04rSWTdIjRXbEsb3q1JJr9P66p7dqEQ&oe=66E6D90C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5qD49BE5-OgQ7kNvgFuMBKy&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AgGzeJkxdMpTFnHEoDQnB86&oh=00_AYCHPqPATAuEPkmY9AON0wvl_iLu4b25rQnp7rOqz93byQ&oe=66E6D71F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ZCHNunD63kkQ7kNvgGM9WFp&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AgGzeJkxdMpTFnHEoDQnB86&oh=00_AYAlXBzvh8CBhnAtrwNSUfNpdotCqCMqxTYVDdp-LDPrWQ&oe=66E6BC71)
